title: 399. Q&AF: The Importance Of Sleep, Giving Buyers More Options & Dealing With Rude Customers
itunes:title: 399. Q&AF: The Importance Of Sleep, Giving Buyers More Options & Dealing With Rude Customers
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions about what role sleep should play in your personal development journey, if more options are better or worse for sales in your business, and the best way to deal with customers that are rude towards your employees.
